text: Posting with permission from the godfather <@UJG9WTEKG> :slightly_smiling_face: This may not be common, but I wanted to float the idea by this group (for those in the NYC/Boston areas): <https://www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:6549642270956630016> (Also, cmon LinkedIn, clean up your damn meta-data layout, because gross)

attachments.title: Jay Acunzo on LinkedIn: "Exploding offer & this could fall flat but here goes:  I'm working on a new keynote (and eventual book) about making innovation on marketing teams a habit, not a Hail Mary. I'd love to...  1. deliver this to a small # of groups or companies FOR FREE  2. ...somewhere in the NYC or Boston areas...  3. ...sometime in June-July-Aug.  This is so I can workshop the ideas and work out the performance kinks.  Can I stop by, present, & hang out with your team or community group for awhile?  (If you're intrigued but unfamiliar with my speaking, visit jayacunzo-dot-com to see a video, testimonials, past clients, etc.)  See image below for the rough draft description of the talk.  #NYC #branding #marketing #contentmarketing #advertising #innovation #creativity"
attachments.text: June 26, 2019: Jay Acunzo posted images on LinkedIn
